content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-10.5, 25.5)
Consists of offshore pump (position -10.5, 25.5), boiler (position -4.5, 23.0) and steam engine (position -0.5, -9.5).

### Copper plate mine at position(0, 0)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position x1) and a furnace at position(0, 0)
- Burner mining drill (position x2) and a furnace at position(5, 5)

### Copper cable factory
Consists of following entities
- Assembling machine at position(z1) and inserter at position(a) that puts into assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position) that connects the furnace at position y1 to assembling machine at position(z1)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors when trying to access entities that do not exist
- Verify the position of the entity before trying to access it. In this case, the boiler at position (-4.5, 23.0) could not be found. Check if it has been placed correctly or if it exists at that position.
